source_objects.title: Creativity
source_objects.description: From idea generation to creative confidence, the power of the subconcious to innovation and invention, come discover methods of creativity.

items.title: Alcohol ink
items.headline: Learn alcohol ink bubbles and abstract
objectives_summary: Have a greater understand of inks and learn new techniques to help develop your art

items.title: Creative Thinking : How to Think More Creatively
items.headline: Learn to Use Mind Mapping and Creative Problem Solving
objectives_summary: Creative thinking.
How to think creatively.
How to approach situations and problems in new ways.

items.title: Jewelry Making For Beginners: Art Resin Pendant and Earrings
items.headline: Make your own fashionable jewelry using tinted Resin to create a one of a kind Pendant and earring set.
objectives_summary: Create Beautiful and unique jewelry pendants and earrings using Resin. We will tint the resin with different mediums, we will cover a few different options
A desire to learn and a little bit of time to practice these techniques
Unlimited lifetime access from anywhere in the world!

items.title: Creative Writing For Beginners - Writing Creative Prose

visible_instructors.title: James Bruce
visible_instructors.name: James
visible_instructors.job_title: SEO Expert, Marketer, Author, and Teacher

items.headline: Creative Writing For Beginners : Beginners Creative Writing Tips : Creative Writing : Writing Creative Prose - Beginners
objectives_summary: Creative writing enthusiasts who are beginners will learn how to apply basic rules and conventions to their creative writing.
Beginner writers will Increase their ability to write fiction using better prose.

items.title: Creativity, problem solving and generating alternatives
items.headline: Master the skills and tools that will allow you to drive innovation, create alternatives and generate solutions
objectives_summary: How to generate alternatives
How to include creative thinking in everyday situations
Rational techniques for generating solutions

items.title: Wedding Flower Design School for the DIY Bride

visible_instructors.title: Katherine Watren
visible_instructors.name: Katherine
visible_instructors.job_title: Certified Master Floral Designer and Instructor

items.headline: Learn how to create your own wedding flowers from Bouquets, Corsages, Boutonnieres, Decor, and Centerpieces.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course students will be able to create wedding flowers such as bouquets, corsages, boutonnieres, decor and centerpieces. With this knowledge you can decide to take on a full wedding or just pick a few projects to add a personal touch to your nuptials or someone elses. What a great way to save money and add your own personal style !.

items.title: Creative Thinking
items.headline: Opening perspectives and Thinking big
objectives_summary: Be creative in different contexts and projects, their success determined solely by their willpower and ideas.
Question the obvious and think beyond stereotypes to widen their perspectives of the world and create with a broader point of view.
Think big and get inspiration from the most unexpected sources.

items.title: Poetry Primer - Survey of Poetic Writing Styles and Projects

visible_instructors.title: Trace Crawford
visible_instructors.name: Trace
visible_instructors.job_title: Instructor / Writer / Teacher for over 20 years

items.headline: The verse writing techniques and terms you need to write poems in various styles and become the poet you want to be
objectives_summary: This is a fun and practical writing course designed to get you excited about creating your own poems in a variety of styles!
The various poetic styles, writing concepts and terminology you need to write amazing poetry.
A series of authentic writing projects designed to target the skills you need.

items.title: Writing Comics: A Comprehensive Guide

visible_instructors.title: Stefan Petrucha
visible_instructors.name: Stefan
visible_instructors.job_title: Author of over 20 books and hundreds of graphic novels!

items.headline: Learn the ins and outs of writing comic books from a seasoned pro.
objectives_summary: How to write comic books like a pro
How and why comics work
The writer's place in the production flow

items.title: Creative Thinking Genius Vol. 1:  Unleash Your Creativity
items.headline: How to Spark Your Creative Thinking - Quickly Generate Creative Ideas for Writing, Problem Solving & Business Creativity
objectives_summary: INSPIRE More Creative Brain States Naturally
GENERATE Creative Ideas at Will
FIND Creative Solutions to Problems Quickly

items.title: Short story masterclass: learn from a prizewinning author!

visible_instructors.title: Nicola Valentine
visible_instructors.name: Nicola
visible_instructors.job_title: Prize winning novelist, screenwriter and lecturer

items.headline: Improve your creative writing; create, polish and publish short stories, all under the guidance of an acclaimed writer.
objectives_summary: Generate and develop ideas for short stories
Draft short stories
Edit and polish written prose

items.title: Creative Writing: Creative Exercises For New Writing Ideas

visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose
visible_instructors.name: Tatiana
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills

items.headline: 30 Creative writing exercises. Writing to improve creative thinking. Write to make an income from your creative writing.
objectives_summary: Tap into your creativity for fresh ideas
Become inspired to write again
Dissolve any creative writing blocks

items.title: Novel bootcamp; imagine, plan and start writing that book!

visible_instructors.title: Nicola Valentine
visible_instructors.name: Nicola
visible_instructors.job_title: Prize winning novelist, screenwriter and lecturer

items.headline: Get started on the novel you've always wanted to write with methods and techniques to grow your idea into a book
objectives_summary: Find inspiration and ideas through a number of methods
Test ideas to see if they are likely to be novel length
Develop ideas for a novel into a plan for the book

items.title: Writing Your Fantasy Novel
items.headline: Writing Fantasy: The Foundational Work You Need for Writing and Finishing Your Fantasy Novel
objectives_summary: Form habits to get your writing done
Structure a novel-length fantasy story
Develop compelling characters with depth

items.title: SuperThinker | A Way to Better Thinking

items.headline: Improve Learning Strategies, Communication, Reasoning, Decision Making, and Creative and Innovative Thinking
objectives_summary: Improve learning with metacognition skills
Improve communication skills recognizing strong and weak claims
Craft stronger arguments to better communicate your ideas
